glsa.title: capi4k-utils: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: capi4k-utils is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the bufprint() function.

background.p: capi4k-utils is a set of utilities for accessing COMMON-ISDN-API software interfaces for ISDN devices.

description.p: The bufprint() function in capi4k-utils fails to properly check boundaries of data coming from CAPI packets.

impact.p: A local attacker could possibly escalate privileges or cause a Denial of Service by sending a crafted CAPI packet.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All capi4k-utils users should upgrade to the latest version:
